mapper.sql: select contacts_id as contactsId, member_name as memberName, mobile as mobile, mail as mail, no as no, last_modify_user as lastModifyUser, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime from monitor_contacts
mapper.select:
WHERE 1=1
and contacts_id in
#{item}
and member_name like concat("%",#{key},"%") or mail like concat("%",#{key},"%") or mobile like concat("%",#{key},"%") or no like concat("%",#{key},"%")
ORDER by contacts_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into monitor_contacts( contacts_id, member_name, mobile, mail, no, last_modify_user, last_modify_time ) values( #{contactsId}, #{memberName}, #{mobile}, #{mail}, #{no}, #{lastModifyUser}, #{lastModifyTime} )
mapper.update: update monitor_contacts set contacts_id=#{contactsId}, member_name=#{memberName}, mobile=#{mobile}, mail=#{mail}, no=#{no}, last_modify_user=#{lastModifyUser}, last_modify_time=#{lastModifyTime} where contacts_id=#{contactsId}
